Test Name: Hazelnut Component RCOR A1 antibody test
Purpose: To generate accurate, reliable, and consistent laboratory results for Hazelnut Component RCOR A1 antibody detection.
Container: Gel separator tube (SST) or heparinized tube (PST)
Equipment: Centrifuge, vortex mixer, refrigerated storage (2–8 °C), microtiter plate reader, calibrated pipettes
